entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Carignan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:40 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Hubert Airport 3:41 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.8°C
Pressure: 100.2 kPa
Visibility: 14.5 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -7.6°C
Wind: W 26 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
